Items.Title: Roskilde Congress Center
Items.Content:
Situated in the middle of Zealand close to public transport Roskilde Congress & Sports Centre is ideal
for any kind of big assembly such as conferences, meetings, fairs, sports events, concerts, theatre and parties.
There are rooms for 20 - 2000 persons and an exhibition area of 4500 m2.The restaurant
overlooks the Roskilde Cathedral. The centre does not offer accommodation.
However, Hotel Scandic and Hotel Comwell is within short distance from the centre and
offers special discount rates in connection with events held at the centre.
ADDRESS
Mollehusvej 15 , 4000 Roskilde
WEB
www.roskildekongrescenter.dk
EMAIL
info@roskildekongrescenter.dk
PHONE
+45 46354072

Items.Title: Roskilde Cathedral
Items.Content:
Roskilde Cathedral is inscribed on the UNESCO world heritage list.
It is a unique and beautiful medieval cathedral.
The Viking kings Harold Bluetooth (d. 985) and his son, Sweyn Forkbeard (d. 1014) conqueror
of England is buried here.Almost 40 kings and queens of Denmark are buried here.
How to get there
Roskilde cathedral can be reached by train from Copenhagen Central Train Station.
It takes about 30 minutes, and from the Roskilde train station
it is a 10 minutes walk through the picturesque city centre.
It is guaranteed that the Cathedral is not closed all day Wednesday
and the other days (except monday) until 1 pm.
Admission Price
Groups
Admission - 40.00 DKK
Adults
Admission - 60.00 DKK
Senior citizens
Admission - 40.00 DKK
